hero.title: About us
hero.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of programs that seamlessly integrate play, education, and community engagement, creating an enriching environment where every child can explore their unique capabilities. By fostering inclusivity and resilience, RICHFAM ensures that children aged 1-19 are equipped with the essential skills to thrive in an ever-evolving global landscape.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To support holistic child development by combining fun, education, and creativity in a nurturing and inclusive space.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: We welcome children from all backgrounds and abilities, creating a diverse and supportive community.

values.title: Holistic Development
values.description: Our programs address physical, emotional, social, and cognitive development needs.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously evolve our methods to incorporate the latest in child development research.

team.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
team.bio: 15+ years experience in child psychology and educational program development

team.name: Michael Chen
team.bio: Expert in designing age-appropriate learning activities and family engagement

team.name: Emily Rodriguez
team.bio: Specialist in building inclusive communities and family support networks
